title: Applied digital outlines $5B data center expansion plans amid strategic shifts

Earnings Call Insights: Applied Digital Corporation (APLD) Q3 2025

Management View

  • CEO Wes Cummins highlighted the company's advancements in the High Performance Computing (HPC) Hosting segment, including two major financial transactions: a partnership with Macquarie Asset Management enabling up to $5B in capital for next-generation
